ARABIC: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلَّيْلَ لِبَاسًا وَٱلنَّوْمَ سُبَاتًا وَجَعَلَ ٱلنَّهَارَ نُشُورًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: It is He who made the night a cloak for you and sleep a rest, and He made the day a time for rising.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: It is He who made the night a covering for you; and made sleep for rest, the day for rising.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And it is Allah Who has ordained the night as a garment for you, and the sleep as a repose of death, and the day as the time of return to life.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: It is He who has made the night as a covering for you, sleep as a rest for you, and the day for you to rise again.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And it is He Who made the night a veil for you, and the sleep a rest, and made the day for getting up.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And it is He Who makes the night a covering for you, and the sleep (as) a repose, and makes the day Nushur.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And He it is Who made the night a covering for you, and the sleep a rest, and He made the day to rise up again.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: It is He who appointed the night for you to be a garment and sleep for a rest, and day He appointed for a rising.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And He it is Who maketh night a covering for you, and sleep repose, and maketh day a resurrection.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: It is He who made the night a mantle for you, and sleep for repose; and made the day a time for rising.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And it is He who hath made for you the night a covering, and the sleep; repose, and hath made the day a resurrection.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: It is He who made for you the night as a covering and sleep for rest and He made the day a recall to life.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And He it is Who makes the Night as a Robe for you, and Sleep as Repose, and makes the Day (as it were) a Resurrection.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And it is He Who makes the night a covering for you, and the sleep (as) repose, and makes the day Nushur (i.e. getting up and going about here and there for daily work, etc. after one's sleep at night or like resurrection after one's death).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: It is He who has appointed the night a mantle for you and sleep for a rest. The day He has appointed for rising.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And it is He who made the night a covering for you, and sleep for rest; and He made the day a revival.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And it is He who has made the night for you as clothing and sleep [a means for] rest and has made the day a resurrection.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [25:47] And He it is Who made for you the night as a garment, veiling [you] like a garment, and sleep for repose, rest for bodies through the [temporary] cessation of labour, and He made the day for rising, [a time] in which all rise to seek their livelihood and so on.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And He it is Who maketh night a covering for you) which covers everything, (and sleep repose) for your bodies, (and maketh day a resurrection) a pursuit for your livelihood.
